short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Christmas theme of web crawling plug-in, any web page can be applied, the results can be saved as csv files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spider let's you turn websites into organized data, download them as CSV. No coding or configuration required.
Spider is a smart point-and-click web scraping tool.  There's no coding experience or configuration time involved, simply open the chrome extension and start clicking.
